tasks.prompt:
single cinematic-comedy; character continuity locked. Camera: HEAD-ON, eye-level, centered two-shot; VERY GENTLE 8s push-in (ease-in-out), ZERO ARC DRIFT. DOF: both dogs sharp, background softly separated. Framing: EXACTLY TWO DOGS ONLY — Labrador (left) and Husky (right) — behind a wooden podcast table; each has OWN mic on boom with pop filter + studio headphones; mics ~10–15 cm from muzzle. Performance: constant subtle motion (breathing, ear twitches, blinks 0.7–1.2 s, slight tail wags).
Lip-sync control:
When one dog speaks, only that dog's mouth, jaw, and tongue move — the other remains in natural idle state (breathing only, mouth closed or minimal reaction).
Each line must match its own voice with frame-level sync (±1 frame).
Idle dog may blink or nod but never mouth motion or speech overlap.
Dialogue: two stable male voices (Lab = warm baritone; Husky = dry tenor).
Timing lock:
0.0–3.5s → Labrador speaks cheerfully, facing mic directly (±10°): "Negotiations with the Roomba continue."
3.5–6.0s → Husky smirks, then replies: "We offered hair. It countered with vacuum."
6.0–8.0s → both dogs laugh loudly into OWN mics; wide jaw-open (15–25°), chest/shoulders bounce (3–6°), head bobs (10–15°); maintain perfect audio–mouth sync.
Environment: cozy plant-filled home, side-window diffused daylight, warm wood tabletop, tidy cables.
Quality locks: subtle continuous zoom; no text/overlays; no extra animals; avoid over-bloom, over-sharpening, ghosting, or rolling-shutter wobble.

comments.output_directory: Optional: Global output directory for all generated PPTX files. Default is current directory.
comments.generation_count: Global default number of videos to generate per task. Default is 1. Can be overridden per task.
comments.schedule: Time format: HH:MM (24-hour format). Leave empty to start immediately
comments.style_name: Task-specific style identifier used in output filename: [Style name]-[Number].mp4
comments.task_generation_count: Task-specific number of videos to generate. Overrides global generation_count if specified.
comments.seed: Random seed for reproducibility. Use 0 for random generation.
comments.output_storage_uri: Optional: Cloud storage URI for output
comments.enhance_prompt: Whether to enhance the prompt automatically (true/false)
comments.generate_audio: Whether to generate audio for the video (true/false)
comments.output_folder: Path where generated videos will be saved. Metadata folder will be created automatically.
comments.text_to_video_note: Veo is a text-to-video API - no input files required. Each task generates one video from a text prompt.
